visualization.help:
# What is the Vizarr Viewer?
Vizarr Viewer allows you to explore Zarr-based image datasets, including OME-Zarr microscopy data, directly in your browser.
After selecting a dataset, the multiscale image will be displayed with smooth zooming and panning capabilities.
## Key Features
- **Zarr and OME-Zarr Support**: Load standard Zarr-based images for scalable visualization. - **Multiscale Navigation**: Effortlessly zoom and pan through very large images. - **Lightweight and Fast**: Optimized for fast viewing even with large, high-resolution data. - **Microscopy Ready**: Tailored for scientific imaging workflows, including 3D imaging and multiplexed data.
This tool is ideal for researchers working with large-scale microscopy, imaging, or spatial omics data.
To learn more about Vizarr, visit: [https://github.com/hms-dbmi/vizarr](https://github.com/hms-dbmi/vizarr)
